item.title: MU
item.description: score:46 Chances: President Joe Biden has spent $23 billion of the $39 billion he has to spur chipmaking in the US, spreading it to companies that plan new activities in several states. Micron Technology Inc has introduced groundbreaking 4150AT SSD, catering to the evolving needs of intelligent vehicles with unparalleled flexibility and power.
